title: The Bachelorette Angie Kent admits her boyfriend gets upset watching her date other men
text:
The Bachelorette's Angie Kent has admitted her secret new boyfriend isn't fond of watching her date other men on national television.

Speaking to Mamamia's No Filter podcast on Monday, the 29-year-old revealed that her steamy on-screen encounters are a thorn in the side of her otherwise perfect relationship.

'You can say that you'll be fine, but when you see it, it can be quite confronting', she confessed.

'It can be quite confronting': The Bachelorette's Angie Kent, 29, has admitted her secret new boyfriend isn't fond of watching her date other men on national television

'I'm such a good communicator and he's a great communicator that we talk about it… It's not normal life, but this is our life right now', she continued.

'I’m okay for him to get upset and he’s okay for me to get upset,' Angie added.

Despite this, Angie said that she has a 'good understanding' with her man about their emotional needs.

'It's not normal life, but this is our life right now': Speaking to Mamamia 's No Filter podcast on Monday, Angie revealed that her steamy on-screen encounters are a thorn in the side of her otherwise perfect relationship

It comes amid claims Angie was left heartbroken after discovering that some of her finalists have 'little to no interest' in settling down with her.

According to Woman's Day, several of Angie's favourites were fame hungry and only too happy to talk trash about her, calling her 'vain' and 'boring' behind her back.

'One of the contestants even told his family that if he was to make it to home visits, they were to lie and say they loved going pig hunting so Angie [who is a vegetarian] would be immediately turned off,' said an anonymous source.

Scandal: It comes amid claims Angie was left heartbroken after discovering that some of her finalists have 'little to no interest' in settling down with her

In addition to following a meat-free diet, Angie often promotes animal rights causes and ethical dog adoption on social media.

It's safe to say that Ryan Anderson isn't the mystery suitor from a family of 'pig hunters', as he is a rescue dog advocate and known animal lover.

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7.30pm on Ten.
description: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent has admitted her secret new boyfriend isn't fond of watching her kiss other men on national television.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
